name: Gin Daisy
description: This gin cocktail is bright and tart, with delicate herbal and berry flavors and a pale pink color.
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon grenadine, such as Small Hand Foods
Mint sprig and assorted berries, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Add Old Tom gin, lemon, grenadine, and simple syrup to cocktail shaker and fill 2/3 full with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Add seltzer to shaker and stir very gently to mix.
Fill a julep cup or rocks glass with cracked ice. Strain cocktail into cup. Garnish with mint and berries and serve immediately.
